ingredients.storage: Refrigerate 3-5 days, freeze up to 6 months

ingredients.name: Bacon
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate 7 days unopened, freeze up to 1 month

ingredients.name: Tomatoes (Roma)
ingredients.storage: Room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate

ingredients.storage: Room temperature for 1 week, refrigerate for 3-4 weeks

ingredients.name: Lime
ingredients.storage: Room temperature for 1 week, refrigerate for 3-4 weeks

ingredients.name: Banana
ingredients.storage: Room temperature until ripe, refrigerate to slow ripening

ingredients.name: Avocado
ingredients.storage: Room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate for 3-5 days

ingredients.name: Bread (Sourdough)
ingredients.storage: Room temperature for 4-7 days, freeze for 3 months

ingredients.name: Butter (Unsalted)
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate for 1-3 months, freeze for 6-9 months

ingredients.name: Milk (Whole)
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate, use by date on carton

ingredients.name: Greek Yogurt (Plain)
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate, use by date on container

ingredients.name: Basil (Fresh)
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate stems in water for 3-5 days

ingredients.name: Cilantro (Fresh)
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate stems in water for 3-5 days

ingredients.name: Brown Sugar
ingredients.storage: Airtight container in cool place for 6 months

ingredients.name: Almonds (Raw)
ingredients.storage: Cool, dry place for 6 months, freeze for 1 year

ingredients.name: Walnuts
ingredients.storage: Refrigerate for 6 months, freeze for 1 year

ingredients.name: Black Beans (Canned)
ingredients.storage: Pantry for 2-3 years, refrigerate after opening

ingredients.name: Chickpeas (Garbanzo Beans)
ingredients.storage: Pantry for 2-3 years, refrigerate after opening

ingredients.name: Tuna (Canned in Water)

ingredients.name: Chicken Stock
ingredients.storage: Pantry until opened, then refrigerate for 4-5 days

ingredients.name: Tomato Paste
ingredients.storage: Pantry for 18 months, refrigerate after opening

ingredients.name: Red Wine
